p:
We parameterized our model by measuring biophysical characteristics of bird specimens in the Museum of Vertebrate Zoology at the University of California, Berkeley. We quantified the 1) shape of each species, 2) average feather length across the dorsum and ventrum, 3) plumage depth across the dorsum and ventrum, and 4) feather absorptance. We obtained the mean body mass of each species from the VertNet database ( http://www.vertnet.org/) based upon collection points in western North America. (
SI Appendix, Museum measurements for parameterization of the heat flux model ).
